cr.name: cr
cr.shortDescription: Make a new file or a new directory
cr.description: Create a new file (if [data] is specified, otherwise create a new folder) at the specified <path>

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: if the 'data' is specified create new file

cat.name: cat
cat.shortDescription: Show the content of a file at <path>'
cat.description: Show the content of a file at <path>. If there is no file at <path>, raise error

ls.name: ls
ls.shortDescription: List out all items directly under a directory
ls.description:
List out all items directly under a directory. 
The output list includes name, created at, and size of each item directly under the current directory, 
and of the current directory itself. 
Size of a directory is the total size of all files within the directory. 
Size of a file is the number of characters in its data.

mv.name: mv
mv.description: Move a file/folder at <source path> into the destination <destination path>. Raise error if:

arguments.name: source path
arguments.description: file or directory path that want to be moved

help.name: help
help.shortDescription: Display syntax and description of supported commands
help.description: Display syntax and description of supported commands

arguments.name: command
arguments.description: command that you need to show documentation
